ValidationRule.description: Don't allow the closure of Tutor Opps without paid or comped Students
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Opportunity_Record_Type_Name__c = "Tutor Opp", ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Confirmed Adoption Won"), Sum_Students_Paid_Comped__c < 3 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tutor Opps much have 3 or more Paid or Comped Students to be closed won
